Tellor.sol and TellorGetters.sol\r reference this library for function's logic.\r Many of the functions have been commented out for simplicity. \r","methods":{"allowedToTrade(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount \r and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked\r","params":{"_amount":"to check if the user can spend\r","_user":"address of user\r"},"return":"true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked\r"},"approve(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use\r","params":{"_amount":"amount the spender is being approved for\r","_spender":"address\r"},"return":"true if spender appproved successfully\r"},"balanceOf(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address)":{"details":"Gets balance of owner specified\r","params":{"_user":"is the owner address used to look up the balance\r"},"return":"Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user\r"},"balanceOfAt(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber\r","params":{"_blockNumber":"The block number when the balance is queried\r","_user":"The address from which the balance will be retrieved\r"},"return":"The balance at _blockNumber specified\r"},"doTransfer(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number\r","params":{"_amount":"to transfer\r","_from":"address to transfer from\r","_to":"addres to transfer to\r"}},"getBalanceAt(TellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number\r","params":{"_block":"is the block number to search the balance on\r","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]\r"},"return":"the balance at the checkpoint\r"},"transfer(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to\r","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to send\r","_to":"The address to send tokens to\r"},"return":"true if transfer is successful\r"},"transferFrom(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to be transferred\r","_from":"The address holding the tokens being transferred\r","_to":"The address of the recipient\r"},"return":"True if the transfer was successful\r"},"updateBalanceAtNow(TellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer\r","params":{"_value":"is the new balance\r","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]\r"}}},"title":"Tellor Transfer\r"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"transferFrom(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it\r is approved by _from\r"}},"notice":"***********************************TEST devdoc.details: Contais the methods related to transfers and ERC20. Tellor.sol and TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic. Many of the functions have been commented out for simplicity.

allowedToTrade(TellorStorage.TellorStora.details: This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount  and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked

params._amount: to check if the user can spend

allowedToTrade(TellorStorage.TellorStora.return: true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked

approve(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruc.details: This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use

params._amount: amount the spender is being approved for

params._user: is the owner address used to look up the balance

balanceOf(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStr.return: Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user

balanceOfAt(TellorStorage.TellorStorageS.details: Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber

params._blockNumber: The block number when the balance is queried
params._user: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

doTransfer(TellorStorage.TellorStorageSt.details: Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number

getBalanceAt(TellorStorage.Checkpoint[].details: Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number

params._block: is the block number to search the balance on
params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

transfer(TellorStorage.TellorStorageStru.details: Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send
params._to: The address to send tokens to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address holding the tokens being transferred

transferFrom(TellorStorage.TellorStorage.return: True if the transfer was successful

updateBalanceAtNow(TellorStorage.Checkpo.details: Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer

params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

devdoc.title: Tellor Transfer

transferFrom(TellorStorage.TellorStorage.notice: Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it is approved by _from
